page.title: 12HAIRDRESSING
page.content: {byPAUL AND SEAN O'SHEA (aged 10and11) We have our hair cut at the barbers. Above the shop there is a sign saying Graham Paul.When we go in the man tells us to sit down.We ask the man if we can have a trim.The man sprays our hair and combs it up.Before the hair leaves the comb he cuts it.To cut round the ear he uses an electric shaver.A hair cut costs Â£2.40. {JAMAICAN HAIR STYLES DONE AT HOME. On Friday every two months Kerine and I get our hair done.The hairdresser starts at five 0'Clock and finishes at eleven 0'clock.It takes three hours for my hair and three hours to do Kerine's.Joyce combs our hair then she plaits it after she plaits false hair on to our real hair then burns the false hair at the bottom.Afterwards she puts on beads then she knots it at the end.{by Kay Morgan aged 10.}
